titleStmt.title: Proposals humbly offered to the Parliament, for the supplying of the King with present money without interest, (whereby he will be better inabled to carry on a vigorous war against France): for the great ease of the subject: for the advance and encouragement of trade: and, for the raising of the price of land.

Proposals humbly offered to the Parliament, for the supplying of the King with present money without interest, (whereby he will be better inabled to carry on a vigorous war against France): for the great ease of the subject: for the advance and encouragement of trade: and, for the raising of the price of land.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
